title: Horror Watch Face
summary: Anatomy Watch Face for Android Wear Clock
description: Fun your friends with the transparent anatomy Watch Face.FEATURES:★ 12/24 auto-format★ High Resolution Design★ Ambient (dimmed) mode★ Support for Round and Square watchesINSTRUCTION:1. Install Watch Face2. Wait a minute2. Go to Android Wear Application3. Choose Horror Watch Face4. Enjoy!The watchface has been tested on Moto® 360, LG® G Watch R, ASUS® ZenWatch, Sony® SmartWatch and other. Any problems? Please email me and I'll try my best to fix any issues you have!
descriptionHTML:
Fun your friends with the transparent anatomy Watch Face.

FEATURES:

★ 12/24 auto-format
★ High Resolution Design
★ Ambient (dimmed) mode
★ Support for Round and Square watches

INSTRUCTION:

1. Install Watch Face
2. Wait a minute
2. Go to Android Wear Application
3. Choose Horror Watch Face
4. Enjoy!

The watchface has been tested on Moto® 360, LG® G Watch R, ASUS® ZenWatch, Sony® SmartWatch and other. Any problems? Please email me and I'll try my best to fix any issues you have!
recentChanges: + Some fixes for Moto 360 (2015) and Huawei Watch
